    • official

      default Many<Broadcast> official(int max)

      Get official broadcasts

      First ongoing official broadcasts sorted by tier, then finished broadcasts sorted by most recent sync time.

      Parameters:
      max - Max number of broadcasts to fetch. 1..100 Default 20

    • streamBroadcast

      Many<PGN> streamBroadcast(String roundId, Consumer<BroadcastsApi.PgnParameters> params)

      Stream an ongoing broadcast tournament as PGN

      This streaming endpoint first sends all games of a broadcast tournament in PGN format.
      Then, it waits for new moves to be played. As soon as it happens, the entire PGN of the game is sent to the stream.
      The stream will also send PGNs when games are added to the tournament.
      This is the best way to get updates about an ongoing tournament.
      Streaming means no polling, and no pollings means no latency, and minimum impact on the server.

      Parameters:
      roundId - The round ID (8 characters).
      params - To disable clocks and/or comments (lke eval) in PGN

    • streamBroadcast

      default Many<PGN> streamBroadcast(String roundId)
      See streamBroadcast(String, java.util.function.Consumer)

    • exportOneRoundPgn

      Many<PGN> exportOneRoundPgn(String roundId, Consumer<BroadcastsApi.PgnParameters> params)

      Export one round as PGN

      Download all games of a single round of a broadcast tournament in PGN format.
      You could poll this endpoint to get updates about a tournament, but it would be slow, and very inneficient.
      Instead, consider streaming the tournament to get a new PGN every time a game is updated, in real-time. See streamBroadcast(String)

      Parameters:
      roundId - The round ID (8 characters).
      params - To disable clocks and/or comments (lke eval) in PGN

    • exportOneRoundPgn

      default Many<PGN> exportOneRoundPgn(String roundId)
      See exportOneRoundPgn(String, java.util.function.Consumer)

    • exportPgn

      Many<PGN> exportPgn(String tourId, Consumer<BroadcastsApi.PgnParameters> params)

      Export all rounds as PGN

      Download all games of all rounds of a broadcast in PGN format.
      You may want to download only the games of a single round instead. See exportOneRoundPgn(String)

      Parameters:
      tourId - The broadcast tournament ID (8 characters).
      params - To disable clocks and/or comments (lke eval) in PGN

    • exportPgn

      default Many<PGN> exportPgn(String tourId)
      See exportPgn(String, java.util.function.Consumer)
